snippet: The owners have told the players' union that they will not renew the collective bargaining agreement when it expires Sept. 15, and the likelihood of a lockout is high.
abstract: The owners have told the players' union that they will not renew the collective bargaining agreement when it expires Sept. 15, and the likelihood of a lockout is high.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

headline.main: Be Prepared for an Extra-Long Off-Season in the N.H.L.
